attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the scandal of late over MP's expenses. It has come to light that most MP's (especially in the London area) are not being paid a sustainable amount for their work in Parliament. This will help ensure that scandals related to the MP's claiming expenditure will no longer be necessary

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
